TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Derrick_Alston, title = Derrick_Alston, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derrick_Alston} }

S.FORM: Derrick Alston sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 20 nqu tay 8, Derrick Alston, squliq na p'unro.
